subject: Deadline Extended:: CFP:: ICIA2013 and ICEEE2013:: IEEE- Poland
from: "The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
Deadline Extended (Aug. 20, 2013):: ICIA2013 and ICEEE2013 

The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC) would like to invite you to participate in the following conferences; please consider submitting your paper to one of them.

Name       : The Second International Conference on Informatics & Applications (ICIA2013) 
Location   : Lodz University of Technology, Poland
Dates      : Sept. 23-25, 2013      
URL        : www.sdiwc.net

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Name       : The Second International Conference on E-Learning and E-Technologies in Education (ICEEE2013)
Location   : Lodz University of Technology, Poland
Dates      : Sept. 23-25, 2013      
URL        : www.sdiwc.net


----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5
